DOC.brief_summary: Randomized , open label , single dose , 4-way crossover study investigate bioequivalence new fix dose combination tablet nifedipine GITS candesartan correspond loose combination compare individual drug
DOC.brief_title: Single Dose Bioequivalence Study Comparing Nifedipine/Candesartan FDC ( Fixed Dose Combination ) With Loose Combination Nifedipine GITS ( Gastro-intestinal Therapeutic System ) Plus Candesartan Single Components Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject Age : 18 45 year ( inclusive ) first screen / examination visit Ethnicity : Caucasian Body mass index ( BMI ) : > /=18 < /=29,9 kg/mÂ² Systolic blood pressure 120 145 mmHg Diastolic blood pressure 95 mmHg Heart rate 45 95 beat / min Clinically relevant finding physical examination Suspicion drug alcohol abuse Regular daily consumption 1 L xanthincontaining beverage Intake food beverage contain grapefruit within 4 week prestudy examination
